text: John Stoneham (15 June 1892 – 1950) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1892 births Category:1950 deaths Category:People from Witham Category:English footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Carlisle United F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Nelson F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: John Stoneham (footballer)
